```{r}

library(tidyverse)

poll_data <- tibble(biden = as.factor(c(rep("Yes", 655), rep("No", 904)))) |>
  slice_sample(prop = 1)
```

U.S Elections are more about a competition between Republication and Democratic parties than general elections. Using the data of voters in the 2024 U.S. presidential election, I seek to predict what proportion of all votes will be cast for Joe Biden in November election.
